content: * each cozy takes approximately 27 yards * my gauge for a 4x4 square was 18 stitches x 25 row * finished size when seamed 3 3/4in wide x 6 in tall * these sleeves will fit most medium sized and some large sized cups * we have included two options for knitting your cozy you can choose to knit it flat and seam it up or knit in the round so there is no seaming at the end * find a crochet version here https //www clicketysticks com/blog-1/icecoffeesleevecrochet * find fun free printable templates here https //www clicketysticks com/blog-1/summericedcoffeecozytemplates
